hotels.title: Serene Vanuatu Tanna Island Tropical Retreat near Mount Yasur with Tranquil Spa & Sparkling Pool
hotels.description: Transport yourself to an exotic dot in the South Pacific with a beachfront stay on Tanna Island, home to the awe-inspiring Mount Yasur volcano. Tucked away in Vanuatu, embrace the rugged beauty of the island while immersing yourself in the comforts of the boutique resort. Take a dip in the pool, stroll along the private beach and snorkel the crystal-clear waters, indulge in a pamper session at the spa or delight your tastebuds with local cuisine at the onsite restaurant
